column4: i have a problem with ~/.dmrc: gdm tells me it has the wrong permissions.  i did what it told me: owned by user, and 644 permissions.  it still has a problem. any suggestions?
i have a problem with ~/.dmrc: gdm tells me it has the wrong permissions.  i did what it told me: owned by user, and 644 permissions.  it still has a problem. any suggestions?
it also told me to change permissions to 644... not 600
I don't know what's wrong with your setup, but I have 600 and It is ok.
I don't know, but having home 777 is .... a very weird idea.
do you know the meaning of these numbers ?!
it is actually almost equal to 700 :)
owner has rwx, group has r, others have r
it worked, thanks for the help
